医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了大流行期间少数族裔 NHS 工作人员的工作经历差异《职业与环境医学》在线发表的研究显示，在大流行期间，与英国白人同事相比，少数族裔 NHS 工作人员更有可能面临工作场所骚扰、歧视和缺乏个人防护装备 (PPE)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Research-reveals-disparities-in-workplace-experiences-for-minority-ethnic-NHS-staff-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Research-reveals-disparities-in-workplace-experiences-for-minority-ethnic-NHS-staff-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a66c2807-c45a-457b-9d20-a9036ec609b3 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:09:06 -0500 Research reveals disparities in workplace experiences for minority ethnic NHS staff during the pandemic
所有人类胎盘样本中均检测到微塑料最近的一系列研究发现，从瓶装水到肉类和植物性食品，我们消耗的几乎所有东西中都存在微塑料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Micro Plastics-Detected-in-all- human-placenta-samples.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Micro Plastics-Detected-in-all- human-placenta-samples.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bca40e2-a96a-4434-93bf-35df9869cd13 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 09:05:10 -0500 Microplastics detected in all human placenta samples
科学家发现小鼠社交记忆回忆的大脑机制人类大脑具有快速区分陌生人和熟悉人的非凡能力，甚至可以同时记住某人数十年遭遇的细节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Scientists-uncover-brain-mechanisms-for-social-memory-recall-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Scientists-uncover-brain-mechanisms-for-social-memory-recall-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ab4ca01-deea-4f39-b785-0d151dba7f2b Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:36:01 -0500 Scientists uncover brain mechanisms for social memory recall in mice
ESMO 大会 2024：塑造抗癌疗法的未来2024 年 ESMO 靶向抗癌治疗大会是一年一度的多方利益相关者会议，重点讨论新型抗癌疗法的开发以及如何改变当前的知识并影响临床护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/ESMO-Congress-2024-Shaping-the-future-of-anticancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/ESMO-Congress-2024-Shaping-the-future-of-anticancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=937b1280-9c23-43e3-82ac-ba923c506aed Wed, 21 Feb 2024 08:27:54 -0500 ESMO Congress 2024: Shaping the future of anticancer therapies

在芬太尼和冰毒的推动下，阿片类药物流行的“第四波”席卷上岸美国正深陷一些专家所说的阿片类药物流行的“第四波”，这不仅使吸毒者面临更大的风险，而且也使解决该国毒品问题的努力变得更加复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/e28098Fourth-wavee28099-of-opioid-epidemic-crashes-ashore-propelled-by-fentanyl-and-meth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/e28098Fourth-wavee28099-of-opioid-epidemic-crashes-ashore-propelled-by-fentanyl-and-meth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5231679b-c8ac-44ac-866f-89ec78138de2 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 06:00:14 -0500 ‘Fourth wave’ of opioid epidemic crashes ashore, propelled by fentanyl and meth

研究：2021 年儿童税收抵免扩大为大流行病期间的家庭提供了帮助美国恢复扩大儿童税收抵免 (CTC) 的提案正在等待参议院投票，波士顿大学公共卫生学院 (BUSPH) 研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，现已到期的 2021 年 CTC 扩大有利于正在经历困难的家庭。由于 COVID-19 大流行引发的健康或就业挑战而导致的财务挫折。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-2021-Child-Tax-Credit-expansion-aided-families-during-pandemic-hardship.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Study-2021-Child-Tax-Credit-expansion-aided-families-during-pandemic-hardship.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5824e60-7ea0-41c0-b0b4-a8d252605047 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 23:54:00 -0500 Study: 2021 Child Tax Credit expansion aided families during pandemic hardship
